# AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.TextCustomAttribute

**Enumeration**

An attribute for custom, localized text attributes.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum TextCustomAttribute
```

## Overview

Assistive technologies can describe these attributes alongside the text.

## Conforms To

- AttributedStringKey
- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- DecodableAttributedStringKey
- EncodableAttributedStringKey
- MarkdownDecodableAttributedStringKey
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.TextCustomAttribute
